DataElement.preferredName: Person Prior Platinum Compound Chemotherapy Exposure Eligibility Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The status of whether a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study based on prior exposure to platinum compound chemotherapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Prior Platinum Compound Chemotherapy Exposure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Earlier in time or order._A chemotherapy compound that contains a platinum atom. Platinum compounds do not contain alkyl groups but do cause DNA crosslinks and adducts similar to alkylating agents. DNA crosslinks and adducts ultimately lead to the induction of apoptosis._The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases._The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A chemotherapy compound that contains a platinum atom. Platinum compounds do not contain alkyl groups but do cause DNA crosslinks and adducts similar to alkylating agents. DNA crosslinks and adducts ultimately lead to the induction of apoptosis.:The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.:The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

Concepts.definition: A chemotherapy compound that contains a platinum atom. Platinum compounds do not contain alkyl groups but do cause DNA crosslinks and adducts similar to alkylating agents. DNA crosslinks and adducts ultimately lead to the induction of apoptosis.
The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.
The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures._A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.: The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.

Concepts.definition: The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.
The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.
